pages.text: I'm not sure how I overlooked such an obvious thing to try, but sprinkling salis mundus onto a block of soulium causes it to collapse. What remains is... I don't even know where to start with describing... 'them'. However, experimenting with them has shown that they will be incredibly useful in progressing my research.

To make use of their power, one must offer up specific items to them, then initiate the 'deal' by feeding them an untamed soul. If they accept the offering, they will summon a being of ethereal nature for you. I have not yet documented all of them, but there is one quirk of these deals that is of great interest to me.

It seems that they are not completely consistent in what entity they provide for a specific set of items, though items provided do seem to influence their decisions. What is most curious however is the occasional small blue spirit they provide, which I am calling a Lost Soul. They do not seem very keen on staying though, as they vanish after only a few seconds. This makes experimenting with them very frustrating.
$(4)If they don't decide to cooperate soon I'll just start trying to kill them.
